short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your browser tabs under control; save your RAM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MonoTab allows you to temporarily save links that you'd like to revisit later. By utilizing the "new tab" screen as the forum for these links, they remain front-and-center to your daily browsing.

By using MonoTab and not having 15+ tabs open at any one time, you will be avoiding browser performance issues by memory leaks in any one website â€” and better browser performance overall.

Save your browser some memory!
